description:
Kyle Law Firm — San Marcos, Texas, Personal Injury And Criminal Law Attorneys

If you are facing a serious criminal charge or have been seriously injured in an accident, the lawyer you hire to protect your rights will make a significant difference in the outcome of your case. For more than 20 years, people in San Marcos and communities throughout Central Texas have been putting their trust in the Kyle Law Firm. Founding attorney Matt Kyle is a trial law specialist as certified by the Texas Board of Legal Specialization. He is one of fewer than 3 percent of litigation attorneys to have earned the distinction in the state. 

A short list of the law firm's other honors and recognition includes:

  • Member of the Million Dollar Advocates Forum for law firms that have obtained settlements and jury verdicts in excess of $1 million in personal injury cases
  • 10.0 Avvo rating — the highest achievable client review rating available 
  • Rated by Super Lawyers, a distinction conferred on law firms that have exhibited the highest standards of legal ability and integrity

To serve you better, the law firm focuses exclusively on the following areas of law:

  • Personal injury and wrongful death claims: Including car, truck, motorcycle, boat and other types of motor vehicle crashes; injuries suffered on dangerous commercial, public or residential properties; injuries suffered as result of defective or dangerous consumer, children's or industrial products; injuries resulting from dangerous medications or defective medical components; and injuries caused by medical negligence. All personal injury claims cases are handled on a contingency-fee basis. You will pay no attorney fees or case preparation costs if you don't recover monetary damages.
  • Criminal defense: Including drunk driving charges (DUI), narcotics offenses, assault and homicide charges, felony and misdemeanor sex offenses, theft, burglary and robbery, weapons charges and fraud and white collar crimes

The firm offers a free initial consultation and lawyers are available to meet with you at your home or courthouse. The staff speaks Spanish.
